info.name: Website Info
info.content:
This site was created to allow you to quickly view various information related to the D4DJ project.



D4DJ.info is not an official site or related site. Official images/information provided on this site are owned by Bush Road and Donuts.

Contact/Question: me@gangjun.dev

contribute.name: Contribute
contribute.content: This website is open source and anyone can contribute through github.

donate.name: Donate
donate.content: This website is operated at the developer's own expense and does not generate any revenue. Please support the server fee so that the site can continue to be maintained.
